NomaiObject:
Clue: Supernova generate lots of heat
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Here is the last shipment of ore from <color=orange>mining site 2b,</color> Root!
2
1
ROOT: You have my gratitude, Cycad! We are truly sorry to have troubled you with so many shuttle trips for this delivery.
3
2
CYCAD: Worry not, my friend. I do not mind traveling by shuttle! In fact, if I had not traveled here by shuttle, I might have missed something rather curious..
4
3
CYCAD: During my many journeys here in the shuttle, I could not help but notice a station in orbit around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern!</color>
5
4
CYCAD: If I had not traveled by shuttle, I would surely have missed this discovery! Might you have any idea what this structure is, Root?
6
5
ROOT: Around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern?</color> Ah! You must have caught a glimpse of the <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab,</color> Cycad!
7
6
CYCAD: Caught a glimpse? Does that mean the <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab</color> exists in quantum superposition around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern?</color>
8
7
ROOT: No, my friend! The <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab</color> is named as such, because it was built to study how meteors launched from <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> are affected as the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> orbits <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow.</color>
9
8
ROOT: The station is difficult to glimpse due to its artificial, stationary orbit around <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> - which causes it to often be cloaked in shadow behind <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern,</color> or <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow.</color>
10
9
CYCAD: How intriguing.. I must visit this <color=orange>Quantum Weather Lab</color> to learn more if I get the chance!
LV R3 5
